example[0]: Hopes of a peace settlement are beginning to fade.
example[1]: Over the years her beauty had faded a little.
definition[1]: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this
example[4]: The sun had faded the curtains.
definition[2]: to become weaker physically, especially so that you become very ill or die
definition[3]: if a team fades, it stops playing as well as it did before
